section.name: Value Lookup
section.p: Most of the examples of context entry value creation we have see so-far are based on effective "construction" of values within a build file (as a part of the creation of a deployment scenario). In addition to constructed values Metro provides a mechanism for the lookup of a service from the containing component.

subsection.name: Example Component Directive
subsection.p: The following build file fragment (taken from the component/104 project) shows how you can use the "lookup" attribute to instruct a container to resolve a service reference by searching up the component hierachy for a component that declares that provides a service assignable to the request interface.
